jobDescription: Qualifications· Must have reliable transportation to get to work· Must be able to take direction· Must be able to communicate effectively· Ability to troubleshoot/problem solve· Ability to make quick decisions independently· Remaining flexible to changes in project-based priorities throughout shift· Able to work days, evenings, weekends, and holidays to meet business needs.Responsibilities· Maintains performance standards· Conducts daily checks for equipment and decor, as assigned· Conducts maintenance and repair of facility equipment· Paints with brush and roller· Works with HVLP (conventional) spray equipment/ airbrush spray gun· Works with hand and portable power tools associated with trade· Performs work on Ladders, Scaffold and elevated platforms· Follow designs and execute decor to designers standards· Participates in organizing, assembling and installing decorations for park events, as needed.· Maintains and upkeeps assigned break areas.· Performs other duties as assigned· Performs all job duties in a safe manner.
